name: SHRIKANT KUSHWAH
title: FULL STACK DEVELOPER
objective: Aspiring Full (MERN) Stack Developer with experience in building responsive web apps using MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js. Recognized in hackathons; skilled in RESTful APIs, JWT auth, Redux, and Tailwind CSS.

education.institution: Shri Chandra Bhan Singh Inter College

experiences.summary: Developed a full-stack web app that matches students with startup gigs, internships, and hackathons based on skill and availability. Achieved a 60% match accuracy during demo evaluations and reduced manual filtering effort by 70% through dynamic filtering and smart matchmaking.

Built a Swiggy-like food delivery platform using React, Redux Toolkit, and Tailwind CSS, featuring real-time restaurant listings and cart functionality. Integrated a Google Gemini-powered chatbot for live order support and personalized restaurant suggestions, reducing checkout drop-offs by 40%. Enhanced user experience by 70% with loading skeletons and achieved 50% faster load times using Vite for optimized performance.

Built a full-stack e-learning platform using React.js, Redux, Express.js, and MongoDB, offering 250+ coding courses across 20+ programming languages. Integrated features like browser-based code editor, progress tracking, and certificate generation to boost learner engagement by 60%.
